author: Md. Ali Memon
comment: Guys please don't waste your time installing this app

reply.author: Deezel Entertainment
reply.content: Hello. I apologize for the poor experience. This app has not been supported for some time and really should not be on the Playstore as it is not current. Again, sorry for any inconvenience.

author: chris chalkley
comment: Great idea, scanned my codes and saved them to app but the app doesn't appear on my LG G Watch R for me to use. Explain how to sort it and I will happily give 5 stars

reply.author: Deezel Entertainment
reply.content: I apologize for the issue you experienced and thank you for bringing it to my attention. There was an issue in which the watch app was completely failing to install on the wearable, and the version I use did not have this issue.  I've since fixed the issue and re-published it to the playstore. Feel free to let me know what you think.  Thanks again!

title: Why doesn't it appear on my watch

author: John Jonz
comment: Its called scan my watch, but it doesn't show up on the watch, only on the phone. What happened?

reply.author: Deezel Entertainment
reply.content: I apologize for the issue you experienced and thank you for bringing it to my attention. There was an issue in which the watch app was completely failing to install on the wearable, and the version I use did not have this issue.  I've since fixed the issue and re-published it to the playstore. Feel free to let me know what you think.  Thanks again!

title: Where is it?

author: Fred Warter, Jr.
comment: QR code is compressed on rectangular watch face. Top to bottom is compressed. QR looks rectangular not square.
title: LG G Problem

author: Kem Sorrell
comment: Nice app. Can't edit list of scanned codes (delete, replace). If I could, or if developer addresses this function, I would surely give a better rating.
title: Sony SmartWatch 3

author: Jeff F
comment: App is working again on LG G Watch R, but QR codes are a bit too large.  You know, there is something in the Wear API to handle that...

reply.author: Deezel Entertainment
reply.content: Update to version 1.17, sorry about the recent Moto 360 issues. I was changing something and didn't realize the impact.  Thank you for sharing. Sorry about that.

title: Working, but QR too Big

author: mary Jane
comment: Great has everything I need keep nearly all my loyalty cards in one place

author: Michael Lynady
comment: All is well - awesome support from a great developer

reply.author: Deezel Entertainment
reply.content: Update to version 1.17, sorry about the recent Moto 360 issues. I was changing something and didn't realize the impact.  Thank you for sharing. Sorry about that.

title: GREAT AGAIN!

author: Rob van Wezel
comment: This app also works offline which is exactly what I needed! I like the fact that it also allows you to select a picture from gallery as input. Dev solved the small technical and graphical issues it had before :)

reply.author: Deezel Entertainment
reply.content: Thanks.  JUST what I needed to keep things going. I'll do my best to address some of the things you mentioned.

title: Just what Wear needed

author: Jeremiah Anschau
comment: Bad execution. No definite way to push codes. In response to your comment, the send code button didn't work.

reply.author: Deezel Entertainment
reply.content:
Thanks for the feedback. 

If you are referring to sending the code to watch, click on the overflow icon and choose send code. If you are referring to sharing the code with others, that feature was in the plan. 

Thanks again for the feedback

title: Great idea

author: harry glenn mercado
comment: a lot better and its easier to add cards by just scanning the barcodes and it will do the rest of selecting the right code format and filling up the needed data correctly. i dont need to bring my loyalty cards anymore, all i need is my android wear because of this app. thanks dev for this great and helpful app.

reply.author: Deezel Entertainment
reply.content: Thanks for the feedback. I'm glad you're finding out useful.  Stay tuned for for features. Take care!

title: a must have app for android wear

author: Patrick Dijkgraaf
comment: Crashes sometimes on the watch while entering a new card on the phone. Also, QR codes are not square on the phone and on the watch. Other than that, very cool to have my watch scanned at the gas station today! :-)

reply.author: Deezel Entertainment
reply.content: Great. I'll take a look at the crash issue as well as try and resize the qr codes. Great feedback and I'm glad it worked. Be on the lookout for some updates over the next few weeks.

title: Nice app!

author: Joel Correa
comment: The coolest app I have seen that does this, fixed minor bugs and works in mostly all stores. Great work

reply.author: Deezel Entertainment
reply.content: Thanks. I appreciate the feedback. Stay tuned for more updates.

title: Galaxy s3

author: Scott Conger
comment: Required permissions are greater that the app needs.

reply.author: Deezel Entertainment
reply.content: You're right. My plan was to add additional features that would need those permission. I apologize if that mislead you or anyone else. Thanks for the feedback.

title: Permissions

author: Tony B.
comment: Good shot though. Keep on going, I'll try it again soon

reply.author: Deezel Entertainment
reply.content: Thanks for the feedback.  I will certainly keep is going.  Stay tuned for enhancements.

title: Little rough around the edges

author: Eduardo Ramos
comment: Only portion that's problematic is how the images displayed aren't actually square. By problematic I just mean annoying. Other than that it's a great app. Keep up the good work!

reply.author: Deezel Entertainment
reply.content: Thanks for the feedback.  I will be updating the QR code layout on the wearable this week.  Stay tuned.  Thanks.

author: Chon Wang
comment: This is a great idea but force crashes often on Note 2 and does not seen to work at stop and shop... The only card I would like to use it with.

reply.author: Deezel Entertainment
reply.content: Thank you for the feedback I will look to see why the crashes are occurring.

title: Great idea but...

comment: Well it really destroyed my watch plz do not add  this app
